front.title: An Information Model for the Monitoring of Network Security Functions (NSF)

abstract.t: The Network Security Functions (NSF) NSF-facing interface exists between the Service Provider's management system (or Security Controller) and the NSFs to enforce the security policy provisioning and network security status monitoring. This document focuses on the monitoring part of it and proposes the information model (IM) for it. This IM is intended to function as a guideline to derive new data models from it and ensure interoperability between them.
